dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, are they really gonna make it even harder for small businesses to, uh, you know, even start up here? With this whole VAT thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, are they really gonna make it even harder for small businesses to, uh, you know, even start up here? With this whole V A T thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, A, that's, um, what some deputies are saying. The government, actually, proposed lowering the VAT registration threshold pretty significantly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, A, that's, um, what some deputies are saying. The government, actually, proposed lowering the V A T registration threshold pretty significantly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On February 20, amendments to the draft Tax Code were submitted to Parliament. In particular, they propose reducing the threshold for mandatory VAT registration from 20 thousand MCI (78.6 million tenge) to 3800 MCI (15 million tenge).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, lowering it? So, like, less money? So more people pay VAT? That seems… backwards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, lowering it? So, like, less money? So more people pay V A T? That seems... backwards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's exactly it. Right now, you typically need to hit, uh, 20,000 MCI in turnover before you have to register for VAT.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's exactly it. Right now, you typically need to hit, uh, twenty thousand M C I in turnover before you have to register for V A T.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In particular, they propose reducing the threshold for mandatory VAT registration from 20 thousand MCI (78.6 million tenge) to 3800 MCI (15 million tenge).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the government wants to drop it to, what, like, 3,800? That's a huge difference!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the government wants to drop it to, what, like, three thousand, eight hundred? That's a huge difference!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In particular, they propose reducing the threshold for mandatory VAT registration from 20 thousand MCI (78.6 million tenge) to 3800 MCI (15 million tenge).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is. From about 78.6 million tenge down to 15 million. It’s a pretty steep drop in the threshold for mandatory registration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is. From about seventy eight point six million tenge down to fifteen million. It's a pretty steep drop in the threshold for mandatory registration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In particular, they propose reducing the threshold for mandatory VAT registration from 20 thousand MCI (78.6 million tenge) to 3800 MCI (15 million tenge).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But, like, wouldn't that just crush the small businesses? The ones barely getting by?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, like, wouldn't that just crush the small businesses? The ones barely getting by?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's precisely the concern Deputy Azat Peruashev voiced. He thinks it would, um, discourage small businesses from even trying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's precisely the concern Deputy Azat Peruashev voiced. He thinks it would, um, discourage small businesses from even trying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Deputy Azat Peruashev had previously disagreed with the amendment: in his opinion, Kazakhstanis would no longer want to engage in small business.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they’d have to deal with all this VAT paperwork even if they're not making, like, huge profits?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they'd have to deal with all this V A T paperwork even if they're not making, like, huge profits?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Correct. His point was that it could push their effective income below the minimum wage if they have to shoulder that burden.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Correct. His point was that it could push their effective income below the minimum wage if they have to shoulder that burden.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lowering the threshold should not result in businessmen receiving income below the minimum wage, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. So, what happened then? Did they just… agree to the government's idea?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So, what happened then? Did they just... agree to the government's idea?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. The Mazhilis working group, um, sent a counterproposal back to the government.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. The Mazhilis working group, um, sent a counterproposal back to the government.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Today, the Mazhilis working group sent the government an amendment from the Ak Zhol faction to establish the VAT threshold at 20 thousand MCI, introduced in response to the government's proposal to lower this threshold to 3800 MCI," the Mazhilis member said on March 6.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A counterproposal? What's that? Like, they said no?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A counterproposal? What's that? Like, they said no?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They did. They want to refuse to lower the threshold. They're pushing to keep it at the current 20,000 MCI.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did. They want to refuse to lower the threshold. They're pushing to keep it at the current twenty thousand M C I.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, the counterproposal of the deputies is to refuse to lower the VAT threshold in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, the deputies are basically saying, "No, keep it the same"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the deputies are basically saying, No, keep it the same?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That’s the, uh, Ak Zhol faction's position, yes. They're trying to block the proposed reduction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the, uh, Ak Zhol faction's position, yes. They're trying to block the proposed reduction.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Today, the Mazhilis working group sent the government an amendment from the Ak Zhol faction to establish the VAT threshold at 20 thousand MCI, introduced in response to the government's proposal to lower this threshold to 3800 MCI," the Mazhilis member said on March 6.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Man. What does the government even say to that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man. What does the government even say to that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, as of now, they, uh, haven't commented on the document. It's still up in the air.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, as of now, they, uh, haven't commented on the document. It's still up in the air.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The government has not yet commented on the document.
